=================

### EP916-240943 Leitrim Chiller Replacement Project

#### Project Overview

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites bids for the Leitrim Chiller Replacement Project, a construction project aimed at replacing chillers and dry coolers at 3545 Leitrim Road, Ottawa, Canada.

#### Project Description

This project involves the provision of construction services to replace chillers and dry coolers. The expected duration of the project is approximately 74 weeks, commencing on **April 1, 2024**, and concluding on **July 27, 2025**. Only contractors possessing a valid Security Clearance, as per the Supplementary Conditions (SC01), will be considered for award.

#### Mandatory Security Requirement

Prior to contract award, the contractor must meet the mandatory security requirement of holding a valid Security Clearance, as outlined in Section SC01 of the Supplementary Conditions.

#### Optional Site Visit

A site visit has been scheduled for **February 22, 2024, at 2:00 PM**, where interested bidders can meet at the project site, 3545 Leitrim Road, Ottawa. To access the site, all attendees must provide the names and dates of birth of each individual attending the site visit, as well as the name of their firm, to the Contracting Authority, Dale Rudderham, at least 72 hours prior to the site visit.

### Important Details

* **Tender Closing Date**: **May 2, 2024, 2:00 PM EST**
* **Notice Type**: Request for Proposal (RFP)
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* **Regions of Delivery**: National Capital Region (NCR)
* **Contracting Entity Name**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)

### Contact Information

For any inquiries or additional information, please contact Dale Rudderham, RFP Lead, at **dale.rudderham@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca**.
